Title: The MacGyver
Strengths: Optimistic and Energetic: Generally upbeat and energetic, they enjoy living on the edge.
Creative and Practical: ISTPs are excellent at applying their creativity to practical solutions.
Spontaneous and Rational: They are adaptable and flexible, able to respond quickly to changing situations.
Know How to Prioritize: Skilled at prioritizing tasks and focusing on what's immediately necessary.
Weaknesses: Stubborn: Can be inflexible, especially when their freedom to explore is challenged.
Private and Reserved: They tend to keep things to themselves, which can lead to misunderstandings.
Easily Bored: ISTPs may lose interest quickly, especially in routine tasks.
Dislike Commitment: They may avoid long-term commitments, both in their personal and professional lives.
Risky Behavior: Prone to engaging in risky behavior, seeking thrills and excitement.
